hcapi3
  • Reference
  • Articles
  • News

Return HarvestChoice indicator metadata

Return complete metadata records for selected HarvestChoice indicators.

indicator(q, version = NULL, as.list = FALSE, cartoCSS = FALSE)

Arguments

q
character array of pattern(s) to search against HarvestChoice indicator codes, labels, and categories. Will attempt a fuzzy match.
version
optional version filter
as.list
if TRUE return a list of indicators grouped by category
cartoCSS
also include formatted CartoCSS rules

Value

a data.table or hierarchical list of indicator metadata

Details

# API call: metadata records for all indicators matching 'cassava' or 'population'

$ curl http://hcapi.harvestchoice.org/ocpu/library/hcapi3/R/indicator/json \ -d '{"q" : ["cassava", "population"]}' \ -X POST -H "Content-Type:application/json"

API call: metadata records for all indicators matching 'population' in a list

$ curl http://hcapi.harvestchoice.org/ocpu/library/hcapi3/R/indicator/json \ -d '{"q" : "population", "as.list" : "true"}' \ -X POST -H "Content-Type:application/json"

See also

category to view HarvestChoice indicator categories

Examples

# Show complete metadata for all HarvestChoice indicators matching 'cassava' or
'population'
#> [1] "population"
indicator(c("cassava", "population"))

# Show complete metadata for all HarvestChoice indicators matching 'population'
# in a hierarchical list
indicator("population", as.list=TRUE)[1:2]
#> $Demographics
#> $Demographics$Population
#> $Demographics$Population$Rural
#>                     label     code            unit       type     period
#> 1:         Rural Pop. '00 PN00_RUR         persons continuous       2000
#> 2:         Rural Pop. '05 PN05_RUR         persons continuous circa 2005
#> 3: Rural Pop. density '00 PD00_RUR  persons/sq. km continuous       2000
#> 4: Rural Pop. density '05 PD05_RUR persons/sq. km. continuous circa 2005
#>        category subcategory  item
#> 1: Demographics  Population Rural
#> 2: Demographics  Population Rural

#> 1:                                  Center for International Earth Science Information Network (CIESIN), Columbia University Earth Center; International Food Policy Research Institute (IFPRI); The World Bank; and Centro Internacional de Agricultura Tropical (CIAT), 2004.
#> 2: Calculations based on data from: Center for International Earth Science Information Network (CIESIN), Columbia University Earth Center; International Food Policy Research Institute (IFPRI); The World Bank; and Centro Internacional de Agricultura Tropical (CIAT), 2004.
#> 3: Calculations based on data from: Center for International Earth Science Information Network (CIESIN), Columbia University Earth Center; International Food Policy Research Institute (IFPRI); The World Bank; and Centro Internacional de Agricultura Tropical (CIAT), 2004.
#>              contact
#> 1:   z.guo@cgiar.org
#> 2: m.bacou@cgiar.org
#> 3: m.bacou@cgiar.org
#>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        description
#> 1:                                                                                                                                                               Population, urban (2000). Urban population calculated as difference between total population and rural population (at year 2000).
#> 2: Population, urban (circa 2005). Urban population in 2005 derived from 29 nationally representative household surveys and population census information conducted in various years (circa 2005). Other countries 2005 urban population estimates derived from World Development Indicators 2008.
#> 3:                                                                                                                                                                                                    Population Density, urban (pers./sq. km., circa 2005). Number of urban people per area unit.
#>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               citation
#> 1:                              HarvestChoice, 2015. "Population, urban (2000)", International Food Policy Research Institute, Washington, DC., and University of Minnesota, St. Paul, MN. Available online at http://harvestchoice.org/data/PN00_URB.
#> 2:                        HarvestChoice, 2015. "Population, urban (circa 2005)", International Food Policy Research Institute, Washington, DC., and University of Minnesota, St. Paul, MN. Available online at http://harvestchoice.org/data/PN05_URB.
#> 3: HarvestChoice, 2015. "Population Density, urban (pers./sq. km., circa 2005)", International Food Policy Research Institute, Washington, DC., and University of Minnesota, St. Paul, MN. Available online at http://harvestchoice.org/data/PD05_URB.
#>         version                                                aggFormula
#> 1: SChEF r12.05                                 sum(PN00_URB, na.rm=TRUE)
#> 2:   SChEF r2.2                                 sum(PN05_URB, na.rm=TRUE)
#> 3:   SChEF r2.2 (sum(PN05_URB, na.rm=TRUE)/sum(AREA_URB, na.rm=TRUE))*100
#>    isRaster                                    url
#> 1:     TRUE http://harvestchoice.org/data/pn00_urb
#> 2:     TRUE http://harvestchoice.org/data/pn05_urb
#> 3:     TRUE http://harvestchoice.org/data/pd05_urb
#>                                                                                    wms
